resources.string: We all know Kotlin is just the best. Kotlin has both object-oriented and functional constructs. It can be used for both client side applications and server side applications. Our site is rich of Kotlin tutorials. Do read them if you want to learn Kotlin :]
Android is a mobile operating system by Google. Development for android platform is even more fun with Kotlin. We have an awesome lineup of Android Tutorials that too based on Kotlin. Enjoy.. :]

The RxKotlin is an implementation of a Reactive Stream specification. Kotlin adds more fun to reactive programming as it adds convenient extension functions to RxJava. Go ahead and have a look to our Rx tutorial. :]
Kitura is a server-side Swift framework for building iOS backends and web applications. This framework creates REST APIs that can be invoked from the iOS applications. We have Kitura tutorial too :]
